plans.name: Free
plans.description: A fast way to get started with GitHub Copilot
benefits: 50 agent mode or chat requests per month
Access to Claude 3.5 Sonnet, GPT-4.1, and more

plans.name: Pro
plans.description: Unlimited completions and chats with access to more models
benefits: Unlimited agent mode and chats with GPT-4.1
Access to code review, Claude 3.7/4 Sonnet, Gemini 2.5 Pro, and more
6x more premium requests than Copilot Free

features.title: Code Completion
features.description: Enhance your coding experience with AI-powered code completions while you are typing. Also called 'suggestions'. These are the most common way of using Copilot as they show up as a suggestion while you are typing in your editor.

features.title: Chat in IDE
features.description: Communicate with Copilot directly within your IDE for instant assistance. You can have multi turn conversations with Copilot on things in your code, or ask it questions on things surrounding your code, like 'how do I do this in Python', or 'how do I run the unit tests from my terminal'.

features.title: Chat on Mobile
features.description: Get coding assistance on-the-go with Copilot's mobile chat feature. This lets you summarize issues/pull requests/discussions, or ask broader questions about a repository for example.

features.title: CLI Assistance
features.description: Streamline your command line tasks with Copilot's CLI assistance.

features.title: Code Referencing
features.description: Get reference information on code snippets that Copilot generates, if they match public code.

features.title: Unit Tests
features.description: Automate your testing process with Copilot's unit test generation.

features.title: Code Translation
features.description: Translate code across different languages with ease using Copilot.

features.title: Code Documenting
features.description: Generate comprehensive documentation for your codebase with Copilot.

features.title: Code Explanation
features.description: Get detailed explanations for complex code snippets with Copilot.

features.title: Code Fixing
features.description: Quickly fix coding errors and issues with Copilot's assistance of '/fix'.

features.title: Code Debugging
features.description: Simplify the debugging process with Copilot's insightful suggestions. Copilot can use the information of debugger, like the call stack, exceptions, variable values.

features.title: Slash Commands
features.description: Enhance your coding workflow with Copilot's slash commands.

features.title: User Instructions
features.description: With user instructions in VS Code you can help guide Copilot in the right direction for your codebase, like being a Python 3 developer and skip older language constructs.

features.title: Integration in Web UI
features.description: Seamlessly integrate Copilot into your web UI for enhanced productivity.

features.title: PR Body Generation in WebUI
features.description: Automatically generate detailed pull request bodies with Copilot in the webUI.

features.title: PR Body Generation in VS Code
features.description: Generate detailed PR descriptions directly in VS Code.

features.title: Ice Breakers
features.description: Generate starter templates or boilerplate code to jump-start development.

features.title: Local In-Editor Code Reviews
features.description: Highlight and review suggested code changes directly from within the Visual Studio editor.

features.title: Playwright Test Generation
features.description: Generate Playwright tests for UI testing scenarios directly from existing code.

features.title: Commit Message Suggestions
features.description: Copilot proposes commit messages based on the code changes in the current changeset.

features.title: Commit Message Custom Instructions
features.description: Customize commit messages with tailored instructions for more descriptive and meaningful comments.

features.title: Web Search with Bing
features.description: Perform web searches within your coding environment using Copilot and Bing.

features.title: Explain Failed Action Jobs
features.description: Get help from GitHub Copilot to explain why a certain action job failed and help you fixing it.

features.title: Fetch Webpage
features.description: Retrieve a web page as part of the context you provide with your prompt.

features.title: GPT-4o Copilot Suggestions Model
features.description: GPT-4o Copilot replaces the previously used GPT 3.5 TURBO model for suggestions.

features.title: Next Edit Suggestions
features.description: NES Looks ahead for you while editing and comes up with related changes.

features.title: Premium Requests
features.description: What are GitHub Copilot Premium Requests and do their rate limits work? These chances will be in effect during the month of May. Read more info of the enforcements in the documentation.

features.title: Agent Mode
features.description: How Agent Mode helps you by iterating over your prompt by itself.

features.title: MCP with Azure and GitHub
features.description: Empower Agent Mode with extra context and capabilities by supercharging it with MCP servers. See how you can bring in extra information from Azure resources to add extra information to creating GitHub issues.

features.title: Bring Your Own LLM
features.description: A powerfull feature in the current insiders version of VS Code is to bring your own model to the chat conversation. You can use a local running model or connect with a remote model using your own API key.

features.title: Chat with your Pull Request
features.description: Interact with Copilot about your pull request for insights and improvements.

features.title: @github Chat Participant
features.description: Use Copilot as a chat participant in GitHub discussions.

features.title: Multi-Models
features.description: Access multiple AI models through Copilot for different tasks.

features.title: Multi-file Edits
features.description: Make changes across multiple files simultaneously with Copilot.

plans.name: Business
benefits: Data excluded from training by default

plans.name: Pro+
benefits: Access to all models, including Claude Opus 4, o3, and GPT-4.5
30x more premium requests than Copilot Free to use the latest models, with the option to buy more

features.title: Usage Metrics
features.description: Track and analyze Copilot usage across your team.

features.title: Data Excluded From Training by Default
features.description: From the business version and upwards, GitHub Copilot will not use your prompt and interactions to train Copilot on.

features.title: User Management
features.description: This lets you assign licenses per user, for example to every user in a team / organization / or repository.

features.title: Content Exclusions
features.description: With Content Exclusions you can exclude certain parts of your codebase from being sent to Copilot. Think for example of files containing sensitive information, like secrets.

plans.name: Enterprise
benefits: Access to all models, including Claude Opus 4, o3, and GPT-4.5
3.33x more premium requests than Business to use the latest models, with the option to buy more

features.title: Chat with Knowledge Bases
features.description: Leverage organizational knowledge bases in your Copilot interactions.

features.title: Fine Tuned Models
features.description: Use AI models fine-tuned specifically for your organization's needs.

features.title: Set Coding Guidelines for Code Review
features.description: Define coding guidelines for Copilot to follow during code reviews.

features.title: Preview for Copilot Workspace
features.description: Get a preview of the Copilot Workspace environment for better collaboration.
